body.p:
Frankfort Ky 15th 1864
To the Governor
His most Excellency

Sir as i have bin here some time and and you know all about my case i like for you to turn me out as i have a poor mother and no one to help her i could do her some good if i was out i heard that she was sick and no one to help her and you are the only friend i know of plese to turn me out and i will return my sincere thanks for your kind and generous approbation your Most Humble searvant
